alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:32PM CDT until July 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CIMARRON AND NORTHWESTERN DALLAM COUNTIES... At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Texline, or 11 miles east of Clayton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Texline and Felt. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
